description: Kekain Ryuuji (brother of Kekain Yura) and Kekain Mamiru went to Ukiyoe Town to find Yura. During the search, they encounter Aotabo and manage to defeat him. Meanwhile, the Kiyotsugu Parananormal Patrol is having another youkai search, but they realize that lately Yura is not attending in school. They decide to search for her instead. Rikuo finds her training herself in an abandoned place. Moments later, Kekain Ryuji appears. He realizes that Rikuo is a Youkai. At first, Yura doesn`t believe her brother and tries to protect Rikuo but she is defeated. Seeing it made Rikuo decide to transform into his "Night" self to help his friend.
